channel.title: FizzerX - You Won't Believe Your Eyes
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Ja0lzBz.png[/img]
[b]Hello,Mopar. I want to thank each and every one of you who have clicked on this thread. I know that most of you will click away as soon as you see what source I am using, and honestly, I think that would be a mistake. I am using a 317 Allstar base. You are probably laughing, and asking, "Why the hell would he do that? Allstar is dead." Well, you're not wrong... but you're not right, either. It isn't completely dead. I know of a lot of people that would love to play a greatly coded Allstar. Most of the time, Allstar owners shut their server down because it's dead in 2 days. And that is where I am going to make a difference in this community. I am going to spend all of my free time coding this server, because I know that it can be turned into something great. Yes, it will take a very long time to make any Allstar great, or any server for that matter, but it can happen. Nobody likes to give the time and effort. If someone put as much time and effort into coding an Allstar as much as they do criticizing it, they could make one great. Let's bring Allstar back![/b]
[/center]
This is not your average Allstar. This is different. FizzerX is an Eco based game, where it is difficult to obtain money and level up.
To Do List: (Green = Completed, Yellow = Started, but not finished, Red = Not started) Make every skill 100% working Attack Strength Defence Range Prayer Magic Runecrafting Hitpoints Agility Herblore Thieving Crafting Fletching Slayer Mining Smithing Fishing Cooking Firemaking Woodcutting Farming
I will be updating this topic very often. Feedback is always appreciated. [B][SIZE=5] [DEVELOPMENT LOG][/SIZE][/B] - Shilo Village rocks give random gems when you mine them. - All skills require the correct items. Example: Woodcutting requires an axe, mining requires a pickaxe, etc - Woodcutting works perfect, the trees give the correct logs. - Fishing spots give the correct fish. - Use a tinderbox on logs to make a fire. - Use raw fish on a stove to cook it. - Recreated my own Training zones. - New home! - Random items will apear in certain spots. - Added forced NPC texts. - NPC's have dialogue. - Thieving from stalls give money/items, depends on what kind of stall it is. - Pickpocketing works on some NPC's. - Added agility obstacles. - Smithing works 100% with the correct interfaces. - Fixed all the 2h swords. - Recreated the vengeance system. - Recreated the NPC strength. - Created custom quests. - Fixed the ::yell command, and cleaned it up. - Created yell titles. - Created Donator Status. - Fixed all the item dupes. -[B] Doors.cfg[/B] - Fixed the lag. -- MORE COMING SOON --
MEDIA: Quest Tab shows the Staff List and Quests! [img]http://i.imgur.com/2Qs14Dx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jria08Z.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/eaettFE.png[/img]
Fishing! [img]http://i.imgur.com/8LetXjL.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Vdz5ZJT.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ILZ23a2.png[/img]
Credits: - fizzerxdev/FizzerX637 aka Mod Cody (me) - Mod Allstar (for the original source)

item.title: FizzerX - You Won't Believe Your Eyes
item.dc:creator: @FizzerX637 FizzerX637
item.description:
@FizzerX637 wrote:

[center]

Hello,Mopar. I want to thank each and every one of you who have clicked on this thread. I know that most of you will click away as soon as you see what source I am using, and honestly, I think that would be a mistake. I am using a 317 Allstar base. You are probably laughing, and asking, “Why the hell would he do that? Allstar is dead.” Well, you’re not wrong… but you’re not right, either. It isn’t completely dead. I know of a lot of people that would love to play a greatly coded Allstar. Most of the time, Allstar owners shut their server down because it’s dead in 2 days. And that is where I am going to make a difference in this community. I am going to spend all of my free time coding this server, because I know that it can be turned into something great. Yes, it will take a very long time to make any Allstar great, or any server for that matter, but it can happen. Nobody likes to give the time and effort. If someone put as much time and effort into coding an Allstar as much as they do criticizing it, they could make one great. Let’s bring Allstar back!

[/center]

This is not your average Allstar. This is different. FizzerX is an Eco based game, where it is difficult to obtain money and level up.

To Do List: (Green = Completed, Yellow = Started, but not finished, Red = Not started)
Make every skill 100% working
Attack
Strength
Defence
Range
Prayer
Magic
Runecrafting
Hitpoints
Agility
Herblore
Thieving
Crafting
Fletching
Slayer
Mining
Smithing
Fishing
Cooking
Firemaking
Woodcutting
Farming

I will be updating this topic very often. Feedback is always appreciated.
[SIZE=5]
[DEVELOPMENT LOG][/SIZE]

  • Shilo Village rocks give random gems when you mine them.
  • All skills require the correct items. Example: Woodcutting requires an axe, mining requires a pickaxe, etc
  • Woodcutting works perfect, the trees give the correct logs.
  • Fishing spots give the correct fish.
  • Use a tinderbox on logs to make a fire.
  • Use raw fish on a stove to cook it.
  • Recreated my own Training zones.
  • New home!
  • Random items will apear in certain spots.
  • Added forced NPC texts.
  • NPC’s have dialogue.
  • Thieving from stalls give money/items, depends on what kind of stall it is.
  • Pickpocketing works on some NPC’s.
  • Added agility obstacles.
  • Smithing works 100% with the correct interfaces.
  • Fixed all the 2h swords.
  • Recreated the vengeance system.
  • Recreated the NPC strength.
  • Created custom quests.
  • Fixed the ::yell command, and cleaned it up.
  • Created yell titles.
  • Created Donator Status.
  • Fixed all the item dupes.
    - Doors.cfg
  • Fixed the lag.
    – MORE COMING SOON –

MEDIA:
Quest Tab shows the Staff List and Quests!
